setting.name: LiveTime
setting.comment: msec between changes in watch folder and start uploading changes

setting.name: DelayTime
setting.comment: msec; in case of uploading error we must delay a firing the file because it may occurs in case if the file is locked by newest changer

setting.name: GraveyardSettingsFile
setting.comment: file that contains settings for choosen graveyard (_email.xml, _cloud.mail.ru.xml)

setting.name: PermanentStoreFile
setting.comment: store for upload\delete events when CHD is shutted down

setting.name: PullTimeoutAfterSuccessTimeoutMsec
setting.comment: pull timeout in msec between checking changes in graveyard after successful attempt

setting.name: PullTimeoutAfterFailureTimeoutMsec
setting.comment: pull timeout in msec between checking changes in graveyard after unsuccessful attempt and at first time

setting.name: PushTimeoutAfterFailureMsec
setting.comment: push timeout in msec between trying to upload changed files to the graveyard after unsuccessful attempt at the previous attempt
